name: Colourise
description:
Colourise is a puzzle game about connecting the dots. It's easier said than done.

Rack your brain to solve complex spatial puzzles in an astronomy-inspired, abstract, neon world. Mix vibrant, neon colours together; shift dynamic parts of the environment, opening up new pathways to solve seemingly impossible puzzles; and move yourself to see the world from a whole new perspective. What seems impossible to begin with might be clearer than you think.

  • 24 regular puzzles, with regularly introduced, interesting new mechanics.
  • Special levels, with fiendishly difficult puzzles that will have you stumped for hours.
  • Steam Achievements and Trading Cards to complete and collect.
